extendedInfo.description: The world of ZumbaÂ® Fitness is now in the palm of your hand! Find everything related to the Zumba program for free in the new, easy-to-use mobile app. Since its inception in 2001, the Zumba program has grown to become the world's largest â and most successful â branded fitness program, with more than 14 million people of all shapes, sizes and ages taking weekly Zumba classes in over 140,000 locations across more than 150 countries.Are you ready to party yourself into shape? Well, Ditch the Workoutâ¢ and Join the Party!Find Live ZumbaÂ® ClassesTurn your Android device into an instant party finder: â¢ Get accurate directions so you never miss a beatâ¢ Search classes by location and facility nameâ¢ View locations in list or map viewâ¢ Filter your searches by class type, day, time or distanceâ¢ Save and easily access your favorite Zumba classesâ¢ Set calendar reminders, so you donât miss the partyâ¢ Access Zumba Instructor profiles and contact them for class detailsâ¢ Share classes and invite your friends to join your fitness-partiesCheck In to Your ZumbaÂ® Classes Once you find a Zumba class near you, youâll be able to check in to the class and tell your friends how youâre rockinâ the Zumba dance floor! In no time, theyâll be joining you to get in shape while having a blast!Never Skip a BeatGet real-time notifications about upcoming events, sales, new products and more!Keep the Party GoingBe on the lookout for more cool features coming soon!

reviews.title: Still can\'t check into classes
reviews.comment: The app notifies me of my favorite classes and offers to have me check in however, the app will never complete the check in. This is on my android device. If I check in on my iPad it works but who wants to drag their iPad to Zumba and find a wifi connection? Not me. This app has disappointed me.
reviews.author: Jennifer Hansen

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Why doesn\'t the app recognize that I am within 1000 meters of the class when I am standing in the studio?!
reviews.author: Tracie Chandler

reviews.comment: I love the Zumba Fitness App very helpful and easy to use and convenient in the palm of your hand!\tI love the Zumba Fitness App very helpful and easy to use and convenient in the palm of your hand!
reviews.author: Edmond KESHISHIAN

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to explore app
reviews.author: Kelly Mingear

reviews.title: Frustrating! Can never check in!
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app for everything but \"checking in.\"I have never been able to check in. A \"check in\" button has never even shown up. That\'s really frustrating.
reviews.author: Rorri Miller

reviews.title: Never has let me check I n!
reviews.comment: I love the idea of this app however, whoever is maintaining it needs to fix some major bugs! I have never been able to check in to a class. It shows up but never acknowledged that I am there!
reviews.author: Jennifer Sambolin

reviews.title: FIX IT!
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t allow me to check in, saying I need to be near the place when I\'m IN the place or it would simply not let me try. Uninstalling!!
reviews.author: Lilly Tapia

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: So easy to find a class!
reviews.author: Veronica Chavarria

reviews.title: Unintuitive
reviews.comment: Way too finicky to find my class and check in. Takes too long as well.
reviews.author: Delfie Melchor

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Don\'t really understand the purpose of thus app.  I guess it\'s good if you are looking for a class.
reviews.author: Amber Laue

reviews.title: Good idea but
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t let me check in. A charity app should work.
reviews.author: Christianna Fabozzi

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Great for locating classes near you. But won\'t let you log in and won\'t let you check in. Disappointing.
reviews.author: Meredith Voight

reviews.title: App is pointless now
reviews.comment: The promo is over. App only good for finding classes now. It was a nice idea.
reviews.author: Brenda Sheldon

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work ever
reviews.comment: Wen I\'m in studio I\'m not within 1000 meters even with GPS on
reviews.author: Marie Roberts

reviews.title: please help
reviews.comment: i re-installed the app but i can\'t remember my user name and password, i can only reset passeord if i know my user name, but for the life of me, i can\'t remember...HELP!
reviews.author: Waleska Lugo

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Kennetta Carter

reviews.title: Cant check in
reviews.comment: I always try and check in but it wont let me.
reviews.author: Karen Delcid

reviews.title: Never can check in
reviews.comment: when I go to check in.....never been able to check in. Doesn\'t let me check in.
reviews.author: Tammy Hoyle

reviews.title: AWESOME APP
reviews.comment: No issues whatsoever!
reviews.author: Cindi Sylvester

reviews.title: Great app!!!!
reviews.comment: Glad the bugs are fixed.
reviews.author: Traci Wheeler
